title: Project-Based Reflective Thinking Development Course for Pre-Service Physics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physics theory knowledge and basic instructional methodology understanding
context.additional_context: Fostering reflective thinking via e-portfolios in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, tailored for corporate professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can perform reflective thinking across three stages: instructional design, lesson demonstration, and video production.
Learners distinguish the three dimensions (focus, inquiry, change) and four levels (routine, technical, dialogic, transformative) of reflective thinking.
Learners practice dialogic-level reflective thinking through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
